DatabaseConnectionStringName.description: The name of the connection string in the application configuration file used for database connection.

Enabled.description: Indicates whether uMarketingSuite is enabled or not.

Analytics.description: Settings related to analytics and visitor tracking.

VisitorCookie.description: Configuration for the visitor tracking cookie.

ExpirationInDays.description: The number of days before the visitor tracking cookie expires.

CookieName.description: The name of the visitor tracking cookie.

IncludeSubdomains.description: Indicates whether the visitor cookie should include subdomains.

DataCollection.description: Settings for data collection and tracking.

AnonymizeIPAddress.description: Indicates whether IP addresses should be anonymized in collected data.

FlushRateInRecords.description: The number of records triggering a data flush to the storage.

FlushIntervalInSeconds.description: The time interval (in seconds) for periodic data flushing.

InternalSiteSearch.description: Configuration for internal site search tracking.

AutomaticSearchTracking.description: Enables or disables automatic tracking of internal site searches.

SearchTermParameters.description: The parameter name for search terms in URL queries.

SearchBoxParameters.description: Comma-separated list of parameters representing search boxes.

CategoryParameters.description: Comma-separated list of parameters representing search categories.

DataStorage.description: Settings for data storage and retention.

DeleteRawDataAfterDays.description: The number of days to retain raw data before deletion.

DataProcessing.description: Settings for data processing intervals and cleanup.

IntervalInRecords.description: The number of records triggering data processing.

IntervalInSeconds.description: The time interval (in seconds) for periodic data processing.

SessionLengthInMinutes.description: The session length threshold (in minutes) for data processing.

AnonymizeDataAfterDays.description: The number of days before data is anonymized in the processing.

DeleteDataAfterDays.description: The number of days before processed data is deleted.

IsProcessingServer.description: Indicates whether data processing is handled on the server.

StartAfterSeconds.description: The number of seconds to wait before starting the cleanup process.

IntervalInSeconds.description: The time interval (in seconds) between cleanup processes.

NumberOfRows.description: The number of rows processed in each cleanup iteration.

ABTesting.description: Settings for A/B testing and data sharing.

MinimumPercentageForAdviceWithPredictedR.description: The minimum percentage for advice with predicted runtime in A/B testing.

MinimumPercentageMacroGoalWarning.description: The minimum percentage for macro goal warning in A/B testing.

ShareDataLevel.description: The level of data sharing in A/B testing. Options: None, Minimum, Medium.

DeliveryApi.description: Settings for the Delivery API and content segmentation.

Segmentation.description: Configuration for content segmentation in the Delivery API.

ContentById.description: Enables or disables content segmentation by ID in the Delivery API.

ContentByIds.description: Enables or disables content segmentation by multiple IDs in the Delivery API.

ContentByPath.description: Enables or disables content segmentation by path in the Delivery API.

ContentByQuery.description: Enables or disables content segmentation by query in the Delivery API.

Profiles.description: Settings for user profiles and identification.

ActiveThresholdInDays.description: The threshold (in days) for considering a user as potentially active.

EngagedThresholdInSeconds.description: The threshold (in seconds) for considering a user as engaged.

EngagedThresholdNumberOfSessions.description: The threshold for the number of sessions to consider a user as engaged.

Name.description: The template for the user's name in identification.

Abbreviation.description: The template for the user's abbreviation in identification.

ImagePropertyAlias.description: The property alias for the user's image in identification.

Reporting.description: Settings for reporting and data generation.

DataGenerationEnabled.description: Indicates whether data generation for reporting is enabled or not.

DataGenerationTime.description: The time of day when data generation for reporting should occur.
